title: Cobb bat on and bat off PSA 1
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Cobb bat on and bat off PSA 1
posts.post_content:
Free shipping within the U.S.

PSA 1 bat on shoulder P150 $635

PSA 1 bat off shoulder P350 (case has a bit of stress fracture to the left of the flip - I fully guarantee that PSA will re-holder it in a new PSA 1 holder) $615

I am open to a payment plan if you are wanting a Cobb but don't have the funds available.  Send me a PM if you'd like to discuss.
